mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yaopin_id as yaopinId ,a.bingren_id as bingrenId ,a.yisheng_id as yishengId ,a.yaopinshiyong_uuid_number as yaopinshiyongUuidNumber ,a.yaopinshiyong_number as yaopinshiyongNumber ,a.caozuo_time as caozuoTime ,a.yaopinshiyong_content as yaopinshiyongContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
